Creation or modification of scheduled ta.Data: Windows Event ID 4698, Windows Event ID 4702, Windows Event ID 7045, Windows Event ID 4688
Creation or modification of scheduled ta.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4698, 4702, 7045, and 4688. Analyze created/modified task/service names, descriptions, and associated executables. Compare against a baseline of legitimate tasks/services. Identify task/service names similar to legitimate ones using string matching or similarity algorithms. Flag creations/modifications occurring outside scheduled maintenance windows.

Execution of rare or previously unseen p.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 7036
Execution of rare or previously unseen p.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations where the parent is a known task/service host process (e.g., svchost.exe, taskhost.exe, taskeng.exe) or a direct service executable path. Identify rare process names or command-line arguments originating from these parent processes by comparing against historical process execution frequency (descriptive statistics) or identifying outliers using frequency analysis.
